comment: Hitler did warn you!!! Now look at the less than Great Britain since the Royalty decided to be in bed with the Jews.
amr:
# ::snt Hitler did warn you!!! Now look at the less than Great Britain since the Royalty decided to be in bed with the Jews.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / warn-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Hitler"))
            :ARG2 (y / you))
      :snt2 (l / look-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (l2 / less-than
                  :op1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Great"
                              :op2 "Britain"))
                  :time (s / since
                        :op1 (d / decide-01
                              :ARG0 (r / royalty)
                              :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                                    :ARG1 r
                                    :ARG2 (b2 / bed)
                                    :accompanier (p2 / person
                                          :mod (r2 / religious-group
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Jew")))))))
            :time (n4 / now)))

comment: You are in no position to chide the Royalty, as you are not one, and there is no need to disseminate race hatred.
amr:
# ::snt You are in no position to chide the Royalty, as you are not one, and there is no need to disseminate race hatred.
(a / and
      :op1 (p / position-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (c / chide-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (m / monarchy))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (o / one
                        :polarity -
                        :domain y)))
      :op2 (n / need-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (d / disseminate-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (r / race)))))

comment: Its inappropriate to use the word 'nigger' as its a direct attack to someone based on their race.
amr:
# ::snt Its inappropriate to use the word 'nigger' as its a direct attack to someone based on their race.
(a / appropriate-02
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :mod (n / nigger)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG1 (s / someone
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                              :ARG2 (r / race
                                    :poss s)))
                  :ARG1-of (d / direct-02))))

# ::snt They are called African Americans
(c / call-01
